thread.title: Re: Guadalupe Garcia reunites with family in Mexico; More details on her felony charges for identity theft
thread.title_full: Re: Guadalupe Garcia reunites with family in Mexico; More details on her felony charges for identity theft

author: wrestlefan01
title: Re: Guadalupe Garcia reunites with family in Mexico; More details on her felony charges for identity theft
text:
— Katie Bieri (@KatieBieri) February 10, 2017 Here is the exact moment #GuadalupeGarcia , reunited with her family, addressed the media. pic.twitter.com/z3WkQnWDRy 
— Katie Bieri (@KatieBieri) February 10, 2017 #GuadalupeGarcia shares an emotional moment with her 14-year-old daughter, Jacqueline: "I'm just more than happy to be here with her." pic.twitter.com/HTIpkc3Neo 
— Katie Bieri (@KatieBieri) February 10, 2017 Trending BAM! Photo shows Betsy DeVos had the LAST LAUGH at today's visit to DC school 
#GuadalupeGarcia 's 16-year-old-son Angel: "It's just the worst thing. It feels like a dream, but this is reality, and we have to face it." pic.twitter.com/KmQxZnN75i 
— Katie Bieri (@KatieBieri) February 10, 2017 
Katie Bieri’s full report is here: Here is our story from last night on #GuadalupeGarcia : https://t.co/D2XCXKPmye with @SophiaKunthara @KaddieStephens 
— Katie Bieri (@KatieBieri) February 10, 2017 
Meanwhile here is more background on the charges against Guadalupe Garcia: NEW Answers to your top 3 questions about #GuadalupeGarcia deportation – including the ID theft. https://t.co/FVOY21xMed #12News pic.twitter.com/KJuqmgG7ih 
— BrahmResnik (@brahmresnik) February 10, 2017 
Quote from the 12 News report: 
Investigators had received an emailed tip about forged identity documents used by employees. A former facilities manager told authorities the general manager said Golfland was going to ignore the law. 
Court documents show Garcia used a social security number that didn’t belong to her, though the complaint doesn’t say whom it belonged to. Garcia’s family members and her attorney say she made up the number. 
Garcia also used an alien registration number — identification for permanent legal residents — that belonged to a 55-year-old man. 
No evidence was presented that individuals were harmed by the use of the Social Security number or alien registration number. 
Garcia avoided trial by pleading guilty to a felony charge of criminal impersonation. She was sentenced to two years of probation and ordered not to remain in the U.S. if she was voluntarily deported. 
Meanwhile back in the US: Now, more than ever, #SF stands by our status as a #sanctuarycity . We will defend the rights of all our residents. https://t.co/w18kr6771Z 
— Mayor Ed Lee (@mayoredlee) February 11, 2017 After the recent @ICEgov raids in #SoCal , our #SanJose community must know that the @SanJosePD will not participate in any ICE investigation pic.twitter.com/6jV175SUhq 
— Sam Liccardo (@sliccardo) February 11, 2017 Please forward me any videos, photos or other documentary evidence of the ICE raids, including any evidence of random citizenship checks. 
— Joaquin Castro (@JoaquinCastrotx) February 11, 2017 ICE should be held accountable for exactly who they are going after and why. I will continue to fight to keep families together. 
— Nanette D. Barragan (@RepBarragan) February 11, 2017 
Left unsaid:
